Report generated: 2025-12-01 03:18:04

======================================================================
Test Case 1 (3D): The 'Decaying Bubble'
======================================================================

Isotropic diffusion with homogeneous Dirichlet BCs.
Exact solution: u = exp(-3*pi^2*t) * sin(pi*x)*sin(pi*y)*sin(pi*z)
Time range: t in [0, 0.1]

======================================================================
SPATIAL CONVERGENCE STUDY
======================================================================
  Grid  11^3: dx = 0.100000, L-inf error = 2.691676e-03, L2 error = 8.248762e-04

  Grid  21^3: dx = 0.050000, L-inf error = 6.733845e-04, L2 error = 2.212759e-04
  Grid  31^3: dx = 0.033333, L-inf error = 2.993397e-04, L2 error = 1.007531e-04
  Grid  41^3: dx = 0.025000, L-inf error = 1.684029e-04, L2 error = 5.737450e-05

----------------------------------------------------------------------
